channel.title: CVE Feed for niteo -- CMP – Coming Soon & Maintenance Plugin by NiteoThemes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for niteo -- CMP – Coming Soon & Maintenance Plugin by NiteoThemes

item.title: CVE-2020-36730|2024-08-04T17:37:07.070Z -- niteo -- cmp%20%E2%80%93%20coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20plugin%20by%20niteothemes
item.description: The CMP for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check on the cmp_get_post_detail(), niteo_export_csv(), and cmp_disable_comingsoon_ajax() functions in versions up to, and including, 3.8.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to read posts, export subscriber lists, and/or deactivate the plugin.
